short_description: birdsall & snowball solicitors is a general practice attorney based in scarborough, united kingdom.
long_description: providing legal services both locally and nationally since 1886 birdsall & snowball. whether you are buying or selling your home or re-mortgaging, our conveyancing team are committed to providing a personal and professional service. moving house can be one of the most disruptive and stressful events of your life. we have been awarded membership of the law society's conveyancing quality scheme, having undergone a rigorous assessment by the law society to earn cqs accreditation which provides absolute assurance for existing and new clients that their transactions will be handled to the very highest of standards. birdsall & snowball's sensitive and practical approach brings peace of mind in later life. we have many years experience of writing wills and helping people to secure their families' future. we can help with: * divorce settlement * civil partnership dissolution * dissolution settlement * living together agreements * declarations of trust * cohabitation breakups * arrangements for children * parental responsibility * relocation * grandparent rights.

generated_description: birdsall & snowball is a law firm based in scarborough, england, established in 1886. it is one of the oldest law firms in the region and the longest-running in scarborough and filey. the firm provides a wide range of legal services, including residential and commercial conveyancing, re-mortgages, leases, and tenancies, divorce and child custody advice, lasting power of attorney, wills and probate, and assistance to the elderly. birdsall & snowball is known for its personal and professional approach, offering a comprehensive service that includes clear and straightforward advice, with a focus on building trust and respect for its clients. the firm is also a member of the law society's conveyancing quality scheme, ensuring high standards in its conveyancing services.
